tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Hello 
I need to share something 
I have paid online for my both of my appointments but for my last appointment which was on 22.4.2022 I by mistake booked video consultation instead of clinic consultation and I was completely unaware about that. When I reached clinic doctor told me that you are booked for video consultation I checked and she was right. So, I asked her what is the solution Mam, She said I will cancel this appointment from my end and I am writing that patient asked to cancel and you will get your money back from Practo and you need to pay here at my clinic. I said fine. She said that she cancelled it by mentioning that patient asked to cancel and as discussed I paid 700 at her clinic. But I never got my money back from Practo aslo the app is adoring for my feedback for video consultation.
Highly disappointed.
Please look into the matter and give my money back as son as possible.
Thank you
Malika Sharma***********
reply_text: Mallika generally in 1 week time u get refund. Still I am also raising this issue with practo from my end as well. Stay in touch.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** **** ******** Polite in nature.. Was not  able to conceive after my marriage.. But after her treatment in one month treatment conceive and deliver a baby girl.. With in 9 month.. Total journey with her excellent.. Thank you doctor.. ** **** ******
reply_text:
I am humbled by your remarks. I am fortunate enough to bring happiness to your life.
Thanks dear.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: In just one month I have seen positive result with Dr. Sunita's treatment. Though my pregnancy is not confirmed yet at the time if writing this feedback but other indicators of infertility like follicular count, hormone levels have improved considerably and reached the expected levels in young women within 35 years of age. I am 37.

tags: Value for money,
review: *** **  ***** ****** *** ********* *** ******** ************** I visited her for the first time on 14th March, 2020 and she advised to get few tests done and see her with reports. I visited her on 16th March, 2020 which is obvious the tests would take one day atleast and visited her on the second day. Despite that she charged again INR 500 ..just to show reports of the tests recommended by her. First day she charged 600 for consultation and 200 for UPT.. can u imagine that... She was ************* insisting to plan for the second child..pat*etic... don't visit her clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Myself Anjum,  after a few months of my marriage, i had face problem of a bartholin's cyst & changed a lot of doctors within 2 years , but did not get positive results. Finally some one recommend me to visit Sunita Mam & she fixed my problem within 15 days. i had also complication in pregnancy & she fixed that too. i am very happy to announce that i got baby girl with the help of sunita Mam. she is very intelligent & looking the problem very closely.
